response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit your business. Given its exceptional value and quality, I am confident it will be an asset to you. Considering its worth to you and its intrinsic value, I am offering it to you for $950,000. This price reflects a strategic midpoint between its perceived value to you and its actual worth to me, aiming to be mutually beneficial. Please let me know if this proposal aligns with your expectations or if you require further information to make a decision.", "product_price": 950000}
